system.description:
While supporting the party in a conflict you heighten everyone's abilities to their fullest through your tactical forecasting into the future. At the end of each round each you perform one of the following actions for the party, based on the the current state.

Condition

Action

An ally is in Crisis

The ally gains @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.effects.13ubm3WjQ8Xuc63Q]{Block}

An enemy enters Crisis for the first time

All allies gain @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.effects.TpmhsH2JmpcsZspZ]{Continuation}

An ally's spell was resisted

The ally gains @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.effects.NnHWJN7xdmMV09yU]{Overwhelming Cast}

A random ally gains @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.effects.TpmhsH2JmpcsZspZ]{Continuation}
